name: Safety
description: The Safety decision point is a measure of the potential for harm to humans or the environment.

values.name: Not Defined
values.description: This metric value is not defined. See CVSS documentation for details.

values.name: Present
values.description: Consequences of the vulnerability meet definition of IEC 61508 consequence categories of "marginal," "critical," or "catastrophic."

values.name: Negligible
values.description: Consequences of the vulnerability meet definition of IEC 61508 consequence category "negligible."
